description: Eye Beam applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by ${$453239s1*$mas}.1% and granting 5 Fury every $453239t2 sec, for 6 sec.

name: Flamebound
description: Immolation Aura has 2 yd increased radius and 50% increased critical strike damage bonus.

name: Monster Rising
description: Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

name: Demonic Intensity
description: Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura. Demonsurge damage is increased by 5% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.

name: Demonsurge
description: Metamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate 3 additional Fury. While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 0 Chaos damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

name: Monster Rising
description: Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

name: Burning Blades
description: Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 0% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

name: Student of Suffering
description: Eye Beam applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by ${$453239s1*$mas}.1% and granting 5 Fury every $453239t2 sec, for 6 sec.

name: Student of Suffering
description: Eye Beam applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by ${$453239s1*$mas}.1% and granting 5 Fury every $453239t2 sec, for 6 sec.

name: Wave of Debilitation
description: $?c1[Chaos][Void] Nova slows enemies by 60% and reduces attack and cast speed by -15% for 5 sec after its stun fades.

name: Set Fire to the Pain
description: $s2% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec. Fire damage taken reduced by $S3%.

name: Enduring Torment
description: Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

name: Void Metamorphosis
description: Collecting $1225789u Soul Fragments grants access to Void Metamorphosis. $@spellicon1217605 $@spellname1217605 |CFFffffffRequires $1225789u Soul Fragments|R You ascend to a higher state of being, substantially empowering your abilities. While in Void Metamorphosis, your Consume and Reap are enhanced and your Fury will slowly drain. Additionally, Void Ray reduces your Fury drain, deals increased damage, and no longer consumes Fury.

name: Void Metamorphosis
description: |CFFffffffRequires $1225789u Soul Fragments|R You ascend to a higher state of being, substantially empowering your abilities. While in Void Metamorphosis, your Consume and Reap are enhanced and your Fury will slowly drain. Additionally, Void Ray reduces your Fury drain, deals increased damage, and no longer consumes Fury.

name: Screaming Brutality
description: Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

name: Guile
description: The cast range of Voidblade, Consume Magic, and Disrupt are increased by 20 yds.

name: A Fire Inside
description: Chaos

name: Thrill of the Fight
description: After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing the damage of your next Reaver's Glaive by 30% and increasing Haste by 6% for 30 sec.

name: Demon Hunter Aldrachi Reaver 11.2 Class Set 4pc
description: Fury of the Aldrachi further empowers Blade Dance when cast after $?s263642[Fracture]?a212613[Shear][Chaos Strike], increasing slashes to 12. Reaver's Mark now stacks up to $442624u times and further empowers $?s263642[Fracture]?a212613[Shear][Chaos Strike] when cast after Blade Dance, applying an additional stack for 100% of normal duration.

name: Soul Immolation
description: Light your soul aflame, dealing 0 Fire damage to yourself, generating ${$1242475s1*$s3} Fury and shattering 3 Soul Fragments over 5 sec.

name: Glaive Tempest
description: The final slash of Blade Dance consumes 25 Fury when it strikes 3 or more enemies, launching two demonic glaives in a whirlwind of energy, causing 0 Chaos damage over 3 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

name: Essence Break
description: Slash all enemies in front of you for 0 Chaos damage, causing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance to deal 0 Chaos damage to them for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond $s2 targets.

name: Voidsurge
description: Metamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate 3 additional Fury. While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 0 Chaos damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

name: Focused Ire
description: The primary target of $?c3[Void Nova][Chaos Nova] is stunned for an additional 2 sec.

name: Demonic Resilience
description: $?c2[Demon Spikes][Blur] gains 1 additional $Lcharge:charges;.

name: Burn It Out
description: $?c3[Soul Immolation][Immolation Aura] removes 1 Disease $Leffect:effects;.

name: Furious
description: Attacks and abilities that generate Fury deal 3% increased damage.

name: Remorseless
description: Attacks and abilities that spend Fury deal 3% increased damage.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: Interrupting a spell with Disrupt decreases your magic damage taken by -15% for 12 sec.

name: Soul Splitter
description: Any time you would generate one or more soul fragments, you have a 2% chance to generate an additional Soul Fragment.

name: Wings of Wrath
description: Glide speed increased by 10%.

name: Soul Cleanse
description: $?c3[Soul Immolation][Immolation Aura] removes 1 Curse $Leffect:effects;.

name: First In, Last Out
description: $?a212612[Fel Rush]?a212613[Infernal Strike][Shift] grants you a rapidly decaying shield equal to 6% of your maximum health.

name: Final Breath
description: Fully channeling $?a212612[Eye Beam]?a212613[Fel Devastation][Void Ray] increases the damage of its final tick by 300%.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: Interrupting a spell with Disrupt decreases your magic damage taken by -15% for 12 sec.

name: Felbound
description: Your movement speed is increased by 3%.

name: Keen Edge
description: Reaver's Glaive damage is increased by 20% and other Physical-only damage is increased by 10%.

name: Broken Spirit
description: The Hunt shatters 1 Soul $LFragment:Fragments;. Blade Dance and Chaos Strike have a 15% chance to shatter a Soul Fragment.

name: Bladecraft
description: Fury of the Aldrachi further empowers Blade Dance when cast after Chaos Strike, increasing slashes to 12. Reaver's Mark now stacks up to $442624u times and further empowers Chaos Strike when cast after Blade Dance, applying an additional stack.

name: Blind Focus
description: Fire damage increased by 5%. Effect is doubled while in demon form.

name: Undying Embers
description: Immolation Aura has a 25% chance to reignite after it expires, reapplying its effect.

name: Soulforged Blades
description: Hungering Slash and Voidblade's critical strike chance is increased by 15%.

name: Volatile Instinct
description: Entering demon form immediately induces a Demonsurge.

name: Singular Strikes
description: Voidblade damage increased by 25%. Hungering Slash deals 50% increased damage to its primary target.
